Nuevo Modern Mexican & Tequila Bar
Food Service
Project Description
Designed for a high-end modern Mexican restaurant and tequila bar in the heart of Downtown Akron, this concept utilizes a distinct geometric form that suggests early Mexican cultures and Mexican folk-art to create a strong, memorable and independent logo mark.
Project Details
  • LocationAkron, Ohio
  • CategoriesLogo, Graphic, Web
